title: Pink and red was the hottest colour combination at the Emmys — here's how to rock it for fall
text:
If there’s one colour combination to try this season, just look to the stars of the 71st Emmy Awards for inspiration.

In a surprise breakout on the red carpet, pink and red has become the colour combo of the season. Celebrities like Mandy Moore, Taraji P. Henson, “This Is Us” star Susan Kelechi Watson, and Marisa Tomei all rocked this controversial colour choice while attending TV’s biggest awards show.

This unconventional pairing was long touted as a fashion faux-pas, but with the support of designers and celebs alike, there’s no denying that this colour combo is here to stay.

If you’re on the hunt for a pop of colour for your own wardrobe, we’ve rounded up some of the best pink and red pieces available to shop the look.
